body:
1. Limitation of posting if you're downvoted: It's really retarded, it kills free speech. That shouldn't exist in very frist place.

2. "Anti-Evil" operations: I guess I don't have to explain why

3. Awards: Ok you need money I get it but it's really retarded when a post gets downvoted to oblivion but has 494838303039 awards. For example, Shit Arts posted some BS about microtranscation in BF2 and it got +600K downvote but got so much gold and platin award that account still has Reddit Premium to this day
body_html:
1. Limitation of posting if you're downvoted: It's really retarded, it kills free speech. That shouldn't exist in very frist place.

  2. "Anti-Evil" operations: I guess I don't have to explain why

  3. Awards: Ok you need money I get it but it's really retarded when a post gets downvoted to oblivion but has 494838303039 awards. For example, Shit Arts posted some BS about microtranscation in BF2 and it got +600K downvote but got so much gold and platin award that account still has Reddit Premium to this day
title: In my opinion, these stuff from Reddit never should come to Ruqqus in any means.

body: Strongly agree on 1. Posting restrictions related to the CCP system is partially how neo-Nazis captured Voat. First they got numbers, then they brigaded people into posting restrictions.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

body:
1. Agreed, and we don't have that mechanism
2. Agreed. The name is Orwellian. @ruqqus issues automatic temp bans for spam and that's it. 
3. Yep, the wide variety of awards is stupid.

1. Agreed, and we don't have that mechanism
  2. Agreed. The name is Orwellian. @ruqqus issues automatic temp bans for spam and that's it.
  3. Yep, the wide variety of awards is stupid.

post.body:
1. Limitation of posting if you're downvoted: It's really retarded, it kills free speech. That shouldn't exist in very frist place.

2. "Anti-Evil" operations: I guess I don't have to explain why

3. Awards: Ok you need money I get it but it's really retarded when a post gets downvoted to oblivion but has 494838303039 awards. For example, Shit Arts posted some BS about microtranscation in BF2 and it got +600K downvote but got so much gold and platin award that account still has Reddit Premium to this day
post.body_html:
